channel.title: How do you get rid of a item in a shop
channel.description: i wanted a good eco and i have a great source but now i just need to get soem items out of the shops to make it perfect. how do you remove items from shops

item.title: How do you get rid of a item in a shop
item.dc:creator: @lugmfr lugmfr
item.description:
@lugmfr wrote:

Exactly what he said I’ll explain it for you better.

Go to your config folder.

Go to shops.cfg

You’ll see things like.

shop = 2 Aubury's_magic_shop 2 2 554 1000 555 1000 556 1000 557 1000 558 1000 559 1000 562 1000 shop = 24 Zaff's_superior_staves 2 2 1379 10 1381 10 1383 10 1385 10 1389 10 1387 10

The item id 1379 is what appears in the shop. The number behind the item id 10 is how many of that item will be sold. If you wish to delete the item. Delete the item id along with the number that follows it.

Save and compile. Remember when adding items to use the tab button not space. If you use space you’ll find yourself with a error when you log in.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get rid of a item in a shop

item.title: How do you get rid of a item in a shop
item.dc:creator: @xkill4lifex xkill4lifex
item.description:
@xkill4lifex wrote:

go to ur config folder and then shops.config then you look for the store that has the item you want to remove. then you look for the item id in that store then u just remove that and the number of items of the item u wana remove.

Read full topic
